events.message: I ordered a jacket last week but it arrived the wrong size. I would like to return it and get a refund.
The customer's issue has been identified as a refund request due to receiving an incorrect item size.
Assigning the refund case to refund specialist agent to proceed with the return and reimbursement process.
Hello, thank you for reaching out. I’m here to help you with returning the jacket and processing your refund.
Could you please provide your order number and confirm if the jacket has been used or damaged in any way?
My order number is 123456789. The jacket is new and unworn. I just want to return it because it doesn’t fit.
We will send you a prepaid return label within the next 24 hours. Once we receive the jacket, your refund will be processed immediately.
Thank you for the prompt response. That sounds good, I will wait for the return label and send the jacket back as soon as possible.
We have received your returned jacket and processed the refund. Please allow 3-5 business days for the amount to reflect in your account.
Just checking in to confirm you have received your refund. Please let us know if there is anything else we can assist you with.
Closing the case following successful refund and customer confirmation that the issue is resolved.
